instruction: Apply digital signal processing techniques to filter and denoise time-series signals. Implement various filtering methods including low-pass, high-pass, band-pass filters, and advanced denoising techniques like Savitzky-Golay and Wiener filters.
description: Implement digital signal processing techniques for filtering and denoising time-series data. Apply various filter types and denoising algorithms.
keywords: signal filtering, denoising, digital filters, time-series, signal processing, python, scipy, Savitzky-Golay, Wiener filter
